items.title: Real World Job Hunt: Strategies that get you Hired!
items.headline: A step-by-step career development training focusing on personal brand, interview preparation, and social media strategy.
objectives_summary: Job Seekers will have a proven framework for a successful job search. Job seekers will learn to ace their interview and answer difficult interview questions. Understand the differences between a Chronological, Functional, CV, and Government resumes. In addition, job seekers will learn to create an effective cover letter, elevator speech, and Linkedin profile.
Most importantly, job seekers will learn to "stand out" and be the candidate of choice to get the job!
